verifyEmail.confirm: Your email address has been verified
verifyEmail.text: You will receive a new message with additional information.

profile.titleOneDescription: This information will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.
profile.titleTwoDescription: This information is only visible by you.
profile.titleThreeDescription: We'll always let you know about important changes, but you pick what else you want to hear about.
profile.formLabelFourDescription: The notifications are only visible on the website.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe from emails
unsubscribe.description: You can unsubscribe from our emails by clicking the button below.

legalNotices.title: Legal Notices
legalNotices.textThree: Owner and Publication Director: Arnaud Lyard
legalNotices.textNine: The content published on the Prochainweb website is the exclusive property of Arnaud Lyard. Any reproduction, distribution, modification, adaptation, retransmission, or publication of this content, even partially, is strictly prohibited without the written consent of Arnaud Lyard.
legalNotices.textTen: Prochainweb strives to ensure the accuracy of the information published on the website. However, Prochainweb cannot be held responsible for any errors or omissions on the site. The user acknowledges using this information at their own risk.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.textOne: On the Prochainweb website, the personal data collected is as follows:
privacyPolicy.listOne: Email address: required for registration and login.
privacyPolicy.textTwo: This data is collected to enable the creation of user accounts, confirmation of registration, and login to the personal space.
privacyPolicy.textFive: The personal data collected on Prochainweb is used solely for user account management and communication (confirmation emails, notifications).
privacyPolicy.textSix: Personal data (email address and username) is retained indefinitely, as long as the user does not request the deletion of their account.
privacyPolicy.textSeven: In accordance with the GDPR, Prochainweb users have the following rights regarding their personal data:
privacyPolicy.listThree: Right of access: you can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
privacyPolicy.listFour: Right to rectification: you can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data.
privacyPolicy.listFive: Right to erasure: you can request the deletion of your account and personal data by contacting us at the following address: arnaud@prochainweb.com.
privacyPolicy.listSix: Right to object: you can object to the use of your personal data in certain cases.
privacyPolicy.textEight: The Prochainweb website uses cookies for user login. These cookies are necessary for the proper functioning of the site and are not used for advertising purposes.
privacyPolicy.textNine: Prochainweb reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Users will be informed of any significant changes via the email address provided during registration.

cookies.partTwo: to offer you the best experience on our site.
